Montgomery Woods State Reserve.address: 15 miles east of the town of Comptche , Comptche , CA
reviewComments: Whether or not you are visiting Orr Hot Springs, just down the road, this is a lovely walk and visit not to be missed. Lovely, oild growth redwoods in a hanging valley meet you... read more
Best Redwood experience around. A little out of the way, but worth the drive to be nearly alone with these amazing beings.
It isn't easy to get to but there are seldom many visitors. There aren't many places one can enter a grove of towering giant redwoods without the crowd.
We've visited a handful of redwood forests in California, and this was the most impressive. Incredibly peaceful, large clearings for great exploring, a creek that floods part of... read more
